message:
SYSTEM: GeneralOntologies2013.pdf: Página 22
Based on Mariano Fernández-López, Asunción Gómez-Pérez and Mª Carmen Suárez Figuereoa’s work 
22 
COMMON NOTIONS: TIME POINTS AND TIME 
INTERVALS 
Time point. As a first intuitive approximation, we can see time points as points in the line time. 
Granularity of days: the Valdemoro Music 
Band concert at Palacio Real was 
celebrated the 22nd of June of 2013 
Example of representations of time points 
Granularity of minutes: the Valdemoro Music 
Band concert was celebrated the 22nd of June 
of 2013 at 19:30 
Time interval. Also as a first intuitive approximation, we can see a time interval as the time between two 
time points. 
Left point 
Right point 
31st of March of 1685 
28th of July of 1750 
Example: Johan Sebastian Bach’s life
speaker: SYSTEM
